name: Mfem
body:
### Welcome to mFEM.
mFEM is an object-oriented, open-source finite element library that includes automatic assembly routines. The project was started to serve as a means for methods testing and comparison against advanced, massively parallel frameworks such as [libMesh](http://libmesh.sourceforge.net/). 

### Acknowledments
Funding for this project was provided by the [National Science Foundation](www.nsf.org) [Earth Sciences Postdoctoral Fellowship Program](http://www.nsf.gov/funding/pgm_summ.jsp?pims_id=503144).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: An object-orient MATLAB finite element library.
